name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Calliope Mori's First 3D Birthday Concert! #calli3DBD [hrcZEjdrkRg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Calliope Mori in her room, giving a pre-concert pep talk to the audience.
Transition scene with a shot of the room then a black screen.
Mori Calliope and Rikka perform the song 'spiral tones' on a digital stage.
MC section after the song where Calliope and Rikka thank the audience.

subtitles.original: I feel good.
subtitles.english: I feel good.

subtitles.original: I feel like we can put on a show,
subtitles.english: I feel like we can put on a show,

subtitles.original: and I'll do my best.
subtitles.english: and I'll do my best.

subtitles.original: It's my first time really doing this like live,
subtitles.english: It's my first time really doing this like live,

subtitles.original: so I'm trying not to run out of energy.
subtitles.english: so I'm trying not to run out of energy.

subtitles.original: I gotta take... I gotta take Kiara's idol expertise to heart.
subtitles.english: I gotta take... I gotta take Kiara's idol expertise to heart.

subtitles.original: I should know that too, being a rapper as well, but you know, I forget.
subtitles.english: I should know that too, being a rapper as well, but you know, I forget.

subtitles.original: And plus, you know, the speakers go boom-boom-boom all the time.
subtitles.english: And plus, you know, the speakers go boom-boom-boom all the time.

subtitles.original: Anyway, let's... let's do a show, alright?
subtitles.english: Anyway, let's... let's do a show, alright?

subtitles.original: Let's do a show, you guys!
subtitles.english: Let's do a show, you guys!

subtitles.original: I'll do my... I'll do my best, okay?
subtitles.english: I'll do my... I'll do my best, okay?

subtitles.original: Nervous or tired? A little bit of both, but also ready to go.
subtitles.english: Nervous or tired? A little bit of both, but also ready to go.

subtitles.original: Let's do this, okay?
subtitles.english: Let's do this, okay?

subtitles.original: Let's go to the stage!
subtitles.english: Let's go to the stage!

subtitles.original: わっしょい、わっしょい、わっしょい！
subtitles.english: Washoi, washoi, washoi!

spiral tones

subtitles.english:
spiral tones

subtitles.original: Ah. Imagine, take a look,
subtitles.english: Ah. Imagine, take a look,

subtitles.original: it's a change of age,
subtitles.english: it's a change of age,

subtitles.original: more an open book that's got a lot to say.
subtitles.english: more an open book that's got a lot to say.

subtitles.original: Like a spiral, others say out of control,
subtitles.english: Like a spiral, others say out of control,

subtitles.original: but we just keep spinning still for that soul.
subtitles.english: but we just keep spinning still for that soul.

subtitles.original: Stay committed to the sick vibes, good music,
subtitles.english: Stay committed to the sick vibes, good music,

subtitles.original: rhythmic type cruising, proof, isn't it?
subtitles.english: rhythmic type cruising, proof, isn't it?

subtitles.original: But you'll lose it, stuck on yesterday
subtitles.english: But you'll lose it, stuck on yesterday

subtitles.original: 'cause it only really matters if you play it that way. Uh.
subtitles.english: 'cause it only really matters if you play it that way. Uh.

subtitles.original: How would you rate this? Add it to your playlist.
subtitles.english: How would you rate this? Add it to your playlist.

subtitles.original: Got something to say, but only when your face'll stay stasis.
subtitles.english: Got something to say, but only when your face'll stay stasis.

subtitles.original: You ain't gotta be held back by the status quo.
subtitles.english: You ain't gotta be held back by the status quo.

subtitles.original: When the odds are stacked, we'll make a badass show.
subtitles.english: When the odds are stacked, we'll make a badass show.

subtitles.original: With our ways with words, blast off to another vista way of the world.
subtitles.english: With our ways with words, blast off to another vista way of the world.

subtitles.original: Move fast when we want to run, knock 'em unconscious,
subtitles.english: Move fast when we want to run, knock 'em unconscious,

subtitles.original: bring 'em back to life and tell 'em, 'Hey, watch this!'
subtitles.english: bring 'em back to life and tell 'em, 'Hey, watch this!'

subtitles.original: そんな音色で 終われるはずがない
subtitles.english: There's no way it can end with such a tone

subtitles.original: 新しいことに挑むには
subtitles.english: In order to challenge new things

subtitles.original: いっそ開き直り切るくらいの方が ちょうどいい
subtitles.english: It's better to just go all out with defiance

subtitles.original: おかしくない？ Don't be surrender.
subtitles.english: Isn't it strange? Don't be surrender.

subtitles.original: 簡単に考えりゃいいよ 厄介な心配は無用
subtitles.english: Just think about it simply. No need for troublesome worries

subtitles.original: ありもしない 後悔なんてナンセンス
